<svg width="512" height="512" viewBox="0 0 512 512" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="grad" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" style="stop-color:#2563eb;stop-opacity:1" />
      <stop offset="100%" style="stop-color:#7c3aed;stop-opacity:1" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width="512" height="512" rx="102.4" fill="url(#grad)"/>
  <g transform="translate(102.4, 102.4)">
    <!-- Coração -->
    <path d="M153.6 76.8 
             C128 51.2 76.8 51.2 76.8 102.4
             C76.8 51.2 25.6 51.2 0 76.8
             C0 128 76.8 204.8 153.6 256
             C230.4 204.8 307.2 128 307.2 76.8
             C281.6 51.2 230.4 51.2 230.4 102.4
             C230.4 51.2 179.2 51.2 153.6 76.8 Z" 
          fill="white" opacity="0.9"/>
    <!-- Texto CV -->
    <text x="153.6" y="204.8" 
          font-family="Arial, sans-serif" 
          font-size="40.96" 
          font-weight="bold" 
          fill="white" 
          text-anchor="middle">CV</text>
  </g>
</svg>
instructions: 2. Converter para PNG usando ferramenta online ou sharp
4. Ou usar logo oficial do Instituto Coração Valente
